text: Do you have the developer-writes scope in your app?

I given all the scope permission .
but developer-writes scope was not there .
Hi, can you recommend any middleware that can communicate with HubSpot and an app that uses soap api?
Hello everyone, I need to create a user email group with an API so that these users receive messages periodically. Could anyone suggest me which HubSpot library is best suited for this purpose?

Hey folks, I've been experiencing some finicky behaviour with the api. When sending a tracking request to create a Contact on HS through js code on a Wordpress site, some days it gets created while others it doesnt (despite the payload always being included as the `i`  param in the tracking request) . There's also no consistency across browsers, some days it works on one and some days it doesnt. Any ideas on what the cause could be? Snippet of the code being used below
```                var _hsq = window._hsq || [];
                _hsq.push(["identify", {
                  email: $(this).find("input[name='user[email]']").val(),
                  firstname: $(this).find("input[name='user[firstname]']").val(),
                  lastname: $(this).find("input[name='user[lastname]']").val(),
                  phone: $(this).find("input[name='user[phone]']").val(),
                  jobtitle: $(this).find("input[name='user[title]']").val(),
                  company: $(this).find("input[name='user[company]']").val(),
                  leadsource: 'IC Email Buiilder Demo',
                  lead_type: 'Inbound',
                  ic_email_buiilder_demo: 'true'
                }]);
                _hsq.push(['trackPageView']);```

Hi everyone, does anyone know how to apply filter using <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/cms/hubdb|HubDB API endpoint> in returning set of rows? It says in the docs (screenshot attached) that it is possible to filter but I am not sure where to place the query parameter in the code:

`const apiResponse = await HubSpotClient.cms.hubdb.rowsApi.getTableRows(tableIdOrName, sort, after, limit, properties);`

Any insights will be much appreciated. Thank you

<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/apps/api_guidelines>
